thread.title: BRIEF-Enbridge Announces Us$1.120 Billion Sale Of U.S. Midstream Businesses

title: BRIEF-Enbridge Announces Us$1.120 Billion Sale Of U.S. Midstream Businesses
text:
May 9, 2018 / 1:26 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Enbridge Announces Us$1.120 Billion Sale Of U.S. Midstream Businesses Reuters Staff
May 9 (Reuters) - Enbridge Inc:
* ENBRIDGE ANNOUNCES US$1.120 BILLION SALE OF U.S. MIDSTREAM BUSINESSES
* ENBRIDGE - INDIRECT SUBSIDIARY ENTERED INTO DEFINITIVE AGREEMENT TO SELL MIDCOAST OPERATING, L.P. AND ITS SUBSIDIARIES TO AL MIDCOAST HOLDINGS, LLC
* ENBRIDGE - AL MIDCOAST INTENDS TO MAINTAIN MIDCOASTâ€™S WORKFORCE AND ANTICIPATES THAT THEY WILL JOIN AL MIDCOAST UPON TRANSACTION CLOSE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
